body_html:
We currently only have support for python 3.5 on windows, as stated in our installation documentation.
I assumed you used python 2.7, as you did not respond negatively to @lxsgdsgg 's query.
Sorry for the misunderstanding. But as I stated, it does not change the answer, we only have support for python 3.5 on windows.

If you are using anaconda, you can follow the suggestion by @jsondoo to create an environment that has python 3.5

body:
We currently only have support for python 3.5 on windows, as stated in our installation documentation.
I assumed you used python 2.7, as you did not respond negatively to @lxsgdsgg 's query.
Sorry for the misunderstanding. But as I stated, it does not change the answer, we only have support for python 3.5 on windows.

If you are using anaconda, you can follow the suggestion by @jsondoo to create an environment that has python 3.5
